long_description: Find out more about our services below: Medical Records Storage CAS are experts in patient and medical records storage, Scanning and management, with the approval of the NHS and FCA. Document storage boxes We provide the highest quality document storage boxes that are made to last- find out about your 30% discount today. Please Note: Whilst we are a leading supplier of secure medical records storage, we CANNOT provide any details what-so-ever for personal medical records.
